journalEntries.title: Drilling down for data
journalEntries.content: There's this HUGE API with Steve's commits, push events, pull request, etc that we are using in one of our exercises.  I sat with Greg for a long time and was able to solve the first question.  After that, things made sense!  It's a cool feeling to get the concept and actually see things working in action.

journalEntries.title: Passing JS over to the DOM
journalEntries.content: We're not only just playing with JS but using JS to pass things over to the DOM.  Really cool!  But still a bit confusing.  I'm getting it to work but not quite sure what I'm doing, haha.

journalEntries.title: The Promise of Fetches
journalEntries.content: We learned about how to run fetches that connect to API's.  For each fetch, there is a thing called a Promise that's returned.  I think I get it on a high level, but I'm going to need a ton of practice.
